attributes.action: Begin The Peace Process Between Ukraine and Russia
attributes.additional_details:
Ukraine has been at war since 2014. 

Weakened tax bases, spiralling costs across Europe, ecological disaster, deadly impasse and the obscene ongoing cost of up to a quarter of a million lives lost yearly is the only plausible outcome of a refusal to work for peace. To speak about achieving justice whilst supplying weapons and prolonging these circumstances is a hypocrisy which must end now.
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, instruct you, our representatives, to reverse diplomatic severance and negotiate for a cessation of hostilities and a lasting peace in Ukraine immediately. See open letter for peace for details (https://www.dovetalesscotland.co.uk/open-letter-for-peace-in-ukraine)

rejection.details:
We already have a petition open on this issue, which you might like to sign:

Stop supplying military equipment to Ukraine and promote peace talks with Russia
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/632957
